!title: Miso Sesame Ginger Dressing
!author: Andreas Wallner
!source: inspired by Sweetgreen (http://sweetgreen.com/)
!size: 3-4 mains salads

* 70g rice vinegar
* 50g oil (canola, olive, ...)
* 10g roast sesame oil
* 10g maple sirup
* 30g brown miso
* 7g soy sauce
* 12g sesame seeds
* 1/2Tbsp ginger
* 1 garlic clove
- blend until smooth
